Ipswich Mobile Library Route 6

The Ipswich Mobile Library is currently off the road for repairs.</a>

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Route 6 Town/village Location Time
6A Chelsworth The Peacock 0945 – 1000
6B Chelsworth Playing Field 1005 – 1020
6C Monks Eleigh The Green 1025 – 1050
6D Brent Eleigh Village Hall 1055 – 1115
6E Kettlebaston Village Hall 1125 – 1140
6F Hitcham White Horse 1145 – 1200
6G Hitcham Village Hall 1205 – 1220
6H Hitcham The Causeway 1225 – 1240
6I Hitcham Bird Street 1245 – 1300
6J Bildeston Brooksfield 1410 – 1425
6K Bildeston Market Square 1430 – 1445
6L Bildeston Newberry Road 1450 – 1505
6M Bildeston Paddock Way 1510 – 1600

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2019: 16 January, 13 February, 13 March, 10 April, 8 May, 5 June, 3 July, 31 July, 28 August, 25 September, 23 October, 20 November, 18 December

2020: 15 January
